abilities.title: Photon Veil
abilities.description: Envelops itself in a cloak of light that renders it invisible to the naked eye.

abilities.title: Echo Pulse
abilities.description: Emits a powerful sonic wave that can disorient foes and shatter obstacles.

abilities.title: Healing Glow
abilities.description: Radiates a soothing light that accelerates healing in living beings nearby.

encounters.outcome: The creature was spotted but vanished before any confrontation; rangers reported a mysterious light show.
Alaric documented the Lumivoraâs healing glow saving a wounded animal, confirming its benevolent nature.
